title: An Act relative to the board of water commissioners of the Dalton fire district

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Davis of Great Barrington and Senator Mark, a joint petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Leigh Davis relative to the board of water commissioners of the Dalton fire district.  Municipalities and Regional Government.
